sqlMap.select:
select
distinct
from B_LAN_LNCI_BASE
order by $orderByClause$

select
from B_LAN_LNCI_BASE where PROTOCOL_NO = #protocolNo:VARCHAR# and STATE = '1' and IS_SETTLE = '0'

select
from B_LAN_LNCI_BASE
MAST_CONTNO = #mastContno:VACHAR#
STATE = #state:CHAR#
CUSTCD = #isSettle:VARCHAR#
select sum(nvl(T1.LNCI_AMT,0)) AS LOANAMT from B_LAN_LNCI_BASE T1 where T1.MAST_CONTNO=#mastContno:VARCHAR# and T1.state != '1'

select
from B_LAN_LNCI_BASE a,B_CRR_LN_CON b where a.MAST_CONTNO = b.APP_ID
b.VID_NO = #vidNo:VARCHAR#
a.STATE != #state:VARCHAR#
a.IS_SETTLE = #isSettle:VARCHAR#
order by a.DEBET_ID DESC

sqlMap.update:
update B_LAN_LNCI_BASE
DEBET_NO = #record.debetNo:VARCHAR#
DEBET_ID = #record.debetId:VARCHAR#
MAST_CONTNO = #record.mastContno:VARCHAR#
APPNO = #record.appno:VARCHAR#
LNCI_TYPE = #record.lnciType:CHAR#
LNCI_STATUS = #record.lnciStatus:CHAR#
LNCI_AMT = #record.lnciAmt:DECIMAL#
LNCI_BAL = #record.lnciBal:DECIMAL#
START_DATE = #record.startDate:CHAR#
END_DATE = #record.endDate:CHAR#
MGRNO = #record.mgrno:VARCHAR#
FIVELEVEL = #record.fivelevel:CHAR#
CURCD = #record.curcd:CHAR#
COMMON_DATE = #record.commonDate:CHAR#
ACCOUNT_NO = #record.accountNo:VARCHAR#
CONFIRM_STATUS = #record.confirmStatus:CHAR#
BAIL_AMOUNT = #record.bailAmount:DECIMAL#
AMOUNT_IN = #record.amountIn:DECIMAL#
AMOUNT_OUT = #record.amountOut:DECIMAL#
FIRST_BAIL_RATIO = #record.firstBailRatio:DECIMAL#
PROTOCOL_NO = #record.protocolNo:VARCHAR#
ORDER_NO = #record.orderNo:VARCHAR#
BILL_TYPE = #record.billType:CHAR#
BAIL_ACCOUNT = #record.bailAccount:VARCHAR#
BILL_NUM = #record.billNum:DECIMAL#

ADD_BAIL_AMOUNT = #record.addBailAmount:DECIMAL#

SLAVE_LIMIT = #record.slaveLimit:VARCHAR#
IS_LOCKED = #record.isLocked:CHAR#
LOCK_APPNO = #record.lockAppno:VARCHAR#
ADD_CASH_EQT_AMT = #record.addCashEqtAmt:DECIMAL#
INIT_CASH_EQT_AMT = #record.initCashEqtAmt:DECIMAL#
LOAN_ACCT_NO = #record.loanAcctNo:VARCHAR#
MAST_CONTCODE = #record.mastContcode:VARCHAR#
CUSTCD = #record.custcd:VARCHAR#
BUSS_BRCODE = #record.bussBrcode:VARCHAR#
ACCT_BRCODE = #record.acctBrcode:VARCHAR#
PRODUCT_ID = #record.productId:VARCHAR#
ACCOUNTANT_TYPE = #record.accountantType:VARCHAR#
DEPOSIT_DATE = #record.depositDate:CHAR#
LOAN_TYPE = #record.loanType:VARCHAR#
ACCRUED_STATUS = #record.accruedStatus:VARCHAR#
LOAN_ACCT_STATUS = #record.loanAcctStatus:VARCHAR#
LOANS_CHARGE_ORDER = #record.loansChargeOrder:VARCHAR#
ISSUED_AMT = #record.issuedAmt:DECIMAL#
AVALIABLE_AMT = #record.avaliableAmt:DECIMAL#
NORMAL_CAPITAL = #record.normalCapital:DECIMAL#
OVERDUE_CAPITAL = #record.overdueCapital:DECIMAL#
IDLE_CAPITTAL = #record.idleCapittal:DECIMAL#
BAD_CAPITAL = #record.badCapital:DECIMAL#
LOAN_FUND = #record.loanFund:DECIMAL#

COLLECTION_ACCURED_INT = #record.collectionAccuredInt:DECIMAL#

LAST_ACCT_TXDATE = #record.lastAcctTxdate:CHAR#

SALE_BRCODE = #record.saleBrcode:VARCHAR#

#productCode:VARCHAR#, STATE = #state:CHAR#, PAY_BRCODE = #payBrcode:VARCHAR#, PAY_TLRNO = #payTlrno:VARCHAR#, PAY_CHECKER = #payChecker:VARCHAR#, IS_SETTLE = #isSettle:CHAR#, ACCU_SEND_AMT = #accuSendAmt:DECIMAL#, BAL_SEND_AMT = #balSendAmt:DECIMAL#, HAS_SEND_BP = #hasSendBp:CHAR#, CORE_STATE = #coreState:CHAR#, CREDIT_NO = #creditNo:VARCHAR#, SALE_BRCODE = #saleBrcode:VARCHAR#, OWN_FUND_PAY_AMT = #ownFundPayAmt:DECIMAL# where DEBET_NO = #debetNo:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
select
distinct
from B_LAN_LNCI_BASE a,B_CNT_DEBT_EXT_INFO b where b.BUSINESS_NO=a.PROTOCOL_NO
a.MAST_CONTNO=#mastContno:VARCHAR#
a.DEBET_ID=#debetId:VARCHAR#
a.STATE=#lnciStatus:VARCHAR#
a.IS_SETTLE=#isSettle:VARCHAR#
a.CUSTCD=#custcd:VARCHAR#
b.BUYER_CUSTCD=#buyerCustcd:VARCHAR#
order by a.DEBET_NO ASC

select count(*) from B_LAN_LNCI_BASE a,B_CNT_DEBT_EXT_INFO b where b.BUSINESS_NO=a.PROTOCOL_NO
a.MAST_CONTNO=#mastContno:VARCHAR#
a.DEBET_ID=#debetId:VARCHAR#
a.STATE=#lnciStatus:VARCHAR#
a.IS_SETTLE=#isSettle:VARCHAR#
a.CUSTCD=#custcd:VARCHAR#
b.BUYER_CUSTCD=#buyerCustcd:VARCHAR#
